entry.name: /HydroTrend/Input/Var/InputDir
entry.label: Input directory
entry.help_brief: Path to input files{cb+bb;GUI;/home/csdms/sims/hydrotrend/default/;/home/csdms/sims/hydrotrend/danube/;/home/csdms/sims/hydrotrend/eel/;/home/csdms/sims/hydrotrend/ganges/;/home/csdms/sims/hydrotrend/lanyang/;/home/csdms/sims/hydrotrend/waipaoa/;/home/csdms/sims/hydrotrend/po/}

entry.name: /HydroTrend/Input/Var/SimulationName
entry.label: Simulation case name
entry.help_brief: Name of the simulation

entry.name: /HydroTrend/Input/Var/RunDuration
entry.label: Run duration (years)
entry.help_brief: Simulation run time in years

entry.name: /HydroTrend/Input/Var/HypsFile
entry.label: Hypsometry file
entry.help_brief: Path to Hypsometry file{cb+fb;/home/csdms/sims/hydrotrend/default/HYDRO0.HYPS;/home/csdms/sims/hydrotrend/po/HYDRO0.HYPS;/home/csdms/sims/hydrotrend/danube/HYDRO0.HYPS;/home/csdms/sims/hydrotrend/eel/HYDRO0.HYPS;/home/csdms/sims/hydrotrend/ganges/HYDRO0.HYPS;/home/csdms/sims/hydrotrend/lanyang/HYDRO0.HYPS;/home/csdms/sims/hydrotrend/waipaoa/HYDRO0.HYPS}

entry.name: /HydroTrend/Input/Var/TempStart
entry.label: <html>Starting mean annual temperature (°C)</html>
entry.help_brief: Starting mean annual temperature (C)

entry.name: /HydroTrend/Input/Var/TempChange
entry.label: <html>Change in mean annual temperature (°C/yr)</html>
entry.help_brief: Change in mean annual temperature (C/yr)

entry.name: /HydroTrend/Input/Var/TempStdDev
entry.label: <html>Standard deviation of mean annual temperature (°C)</html>
entry.help_brief: Standard deviation of mean annual temperature (C)

entry.name: /HydroTrend/Input/Var/JanTemp
entry.label: <html>January monthly temperature {-40, 50} (°C)</html>
entry.help_brief: Values should be single space separated. First value represents mean and second the standard deviation. ex. 19.14 1.05

entry.label: <html>February monthly temperature {-40, 50} (°C)</html>
entry.help_brief: Values should be single space separated. First value represents mean and second the standard deviation. ex. 19.14 1.05

entry.label: Standard deviation of mean annual precipitation (m/yr)
entry.help_brief: Standard deviation of mean annual precipitation (m/yr)

entry.name: /HydroTrend/Input/Var/JanPrecip
entry.label: January monthly Precipitation {0, 3000} (mm/month)
entry.help_brief: Values should be single space separated. First value represents mean and second the standard deviation. ex. 103.91 62.07

entry.label: Starting ELA (m)
entry.help_brief: Starting glacier ELA (m)

entry.label: Change in ELA (m/yr)
entry.help_brief: Change in ELA (m/yr)

entry.label: Dry precipitation (nival and ice) evaporation fraction
entry.help_brief: Dry precipitation (nival and ice) evaporation fraction

entry.name: /HydroTrend/Input/Var/RiverVelCoefficient
entry.label: River mouth velocity coefficient, k (m/s)
entry.help_brief: River mouth velocity coefficient, k, in v=kQ^m (m/s)

entry.name: /HydroTrend/Input/Var/RiverVelExponent
entry.label: River mouth velocity exponent, m (-)
entry.help_brief: River mouth velocity exponent, m, in v=kQ^m (-)

entry.name: /HydroTrend/Input/Var/RiverWidthCoefficient
entry.label: River mouth width coefficient, a (m)
entry.help_brief: River mouth width coefficient, a, in ack=1 (m)

entry.name: /HydroTrend/Input/Var/RiverWidthExponent
entry.label: River mouth width exponent, b (-)
entry.help_brief: River mouth width exponent, b, in b+m+f=1 (-)

entry.name: /HydroTrend/Input/Var/RiverVelocityMean
entry.label: Average river mouth velocity (m/s)
entry.help_brief: Average river mouth velocity (m/s)
